<!-- Just list of original variables in dataset. -->
  
```{r xtable, results="asis", echo = FALSE}

library(xtable)
glossary <- data.frame(ID = names(ds), 
                       `Variable Label` = unlist(description(ds)),
                       Flag = sapply(annotation(ds), function(x) x[2]),
                       Origin = sapply(annotation(ds), function(x) x[3]))
glossaryprint <- xtable(glossary)
align(glossaryprint) <- "l|l|p{15cm}|l|p{4cm}|"
addtorow          <- list()
addtorow$pos      <- list()
addtorow$pos[[1]] <- c(0)
addtorow$command  <- c(paste("\\hline \n",
                             "\\endhead \n",
                             "\\hline \n",
                             "\\endfoot \n",
                             "\\endlastfoot \n",sep=""))
print(glossaryprint,  
      tabular.environment='longtable', 
      include.rownames=FALSE, floating = FALSE,  add.to.row = addtorow,
      hline.after=c(-1),
      comment = FALSE)
```
